result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Robert M Milton Bully not in court, in custody.  Attorney Craig Robert Johnson appeared by video for Robert M Milton Bully.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Status conference held. Defense requests possible case transfer to Branch 2 to be with defendants other pending felony cases and for a global resolution. Court allows for case transfer to Branch 2 for global resolution. Case adjourned to Branch 1. This hearing will be heard via Zoom.
Status conference scheduled for December 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Robert M Milton Bully not in court, in custody.  
Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
OFF THE RECORD.  Status conference held.  Counsel still has not been appointed.Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Robert M Milton Bully not in court, in custody.  
Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
OFF THE RECORD.  Matter set for pretrial conference.  The public defender's office has not been able to appoint counsel yet as the defendant also has a felony case.Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with Marshalls, Pick N Save and Walgreens
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Robert M Milton Bully in court with attorney Fred Richardson.  Defendant Robert M Milton Bully in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
  This hearing may be streamed live at the Court's discretion on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert M Milton Bully
Current: 2469 West Walnut Street, Upper, Milwaukee, WI 53205   (Effective: 07-13-2022)
Prior: 2444 North 39th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53210
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Robert M Milton Bully not in court.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/11/2022@1:00pm
